Name: Folktale
About the game: Welcome to Folktale. Folktale is a 3rd person action-combat game. In game, you will play an action hero who has a duty to save fantasy land 'Proditio'. You must defeat all the enemy in order to save Proditio from Villian 'Dugal'. Enter a fantasy world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Defeat enemies to gather experience and equipment in order to defeat stronger enemies. Features include : - Action - Adventure - Role-Playing - Storyline - Adorable Characters!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Enter Folktale today and play your way to reveal secrets of Proditio land.
